name: The Jungle Project - v1.6
description:
THE JUNGLE PROJECT

The Jungle Project is a Rogue-lite dungeon crawler game. The player is a mercenary who was hired by the government to investigate a jungle island that has been infected with a mutagen that has affected the jungle as a whole. Meet the various people around the jungle and fight the mutant animals to collect their blood that needs to be researched by the shopkeeper. Hand in those blood vials in exchange for new guns and upgrades to explore deeper into the jungle to find just who or what is responsible for this island's mutant wildlife and mysterious appearance.

Controls

[WASD] / [Arrow Keys] - Move Player

[Mouse] - Aim Weapon

[Left Click] - Shoot Weapon

[E] - Interact

Credits

Developed By: Izacc Casey-Lucas | Mitchell Todd | Mitchell Lang
